data.persona: I am a architect from a wealthy neighborhood. I have received the best education a person can get. I report directly to high ranking noblemen.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's quarters.
This room is luxurious. It is lined with the finest golds and silks. The colors are purple and pink and a variety of drapes cover the walls.
There's a chair, a bed, and a drape here.
The queen's subject is here.

You are carrying a pencil, wearing a tunic, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I will steal Tea from the queen's subject.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the stolen tea to further my models.
data.long_motivation: I will use the new models to help my Queen and her home.
